features.name: Mimicry
features.description: You can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitation with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Insight) check.

features.name: Flyby
features.description: You take the Disengage action. If a creature is still able to make a opportunity attack against you, it does so with disadvantage.

features.name: Claws
features.description: Melee: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

features.name: Tackle
features.description: Save: DC 10 vs STR, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target is either pushed 10. ft or knocked prone.

features.name: Flurry
features.description: Effect: You can move 20 ft before this attack. Melee: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (4d4 + 2) slashing damage.

features.name: Regurgitate
features.description: Save: DC 14 vs CON, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d10 + 1) acid damage. The target is Poisoned (save ends, DC 14 CON).
